betterquesting:10.desc:8: Drawing meta-dynamic energy has to be drawn near the fissure, and with poor control, the fissure will decay, and the decay may come when you don't realize it and don't pay attention, and once you don't pay attention, it will destroy the instruments near you, in order to minimize the damage, it's highly recommended to make two mirrors of meta-dynamics, they can be transmitted at a long distance just like the Magic Mirror and the Mirror of the Source Plasm, but it transmits meta-dynamic energy, and you can connect it to the required equipment on it, and it is used in the same way as the Meta-Dynamic Drawing Instrument!
